authorization: xyz
x-test-id: ada4f5c6-063e-4bcb-b514-ef28de94db28
key: val
key-bin: YGY

=== client
{
 "name": "John Doe"
}


=== server
{
 "message": "Hello John Doe"
}

=== trailer

=== status
{
